Class ThemeConfig

java.lang.Object
cosc202.andie.ThemeConfig
public class ThemeConfig extends Object
This class handles the configuration of themes for the application. Some codes are generated by GPT4.0.

  • Method Details

    • CreateTheme

      public static LookAndFeel CreateTheme()
      Creates a LookAndFeel object based on the configured theme settings.
      Returns:
      LookAndFeel object representing the selected theme.

    • SetTheme

      public static void SetTheme(boolean isFollowSysTheme, String theme)
      Sets the application theme based on user preference.
      Parameters:
      isFollowSysTheme - true if the system theme should be followed, false otherwise.
      theme - the name of the custom theme to be set.

    • whatsTheOSTheme

      public static int whatsTheOSTheme()
      Determines the current operating system theme.
      Returns:
      0 if the theme is light, 1 if the theme is dark.

    • getConfigLine

      public static String getConfigLine(int index)
      Retrieves a line from the configuration file.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the content of the specified line in the configuration file.

    • setConfigLine

      public static void setConfigLine(int index, String line)
      Sets a line in the configuration file.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line to set.
      line - the content to set in the specified line.
